snippet.title: Road Frog - ZX Spectrum Gameplay (Steam Re-release)
snippet.description:
[HIGH VOLUME WARNING: The game, especially its title screen, is incredibly noisy.]

Originally released in 1983, this was one of the very earliest releases from Ocean Software (then known as Spectrum Games), which would go on to be one of Europe's biggest game developers and publishers of the 1980s/90s. Road Frog is a simple riff on an arcade classic, released for home microcomputers. Guide a small frog across a busy road, then across logs floating in a river, to reach safety on the other side.

The footage is from Pixel Games UK's Steam re-release.
Also released on Oric microcomputers.

#roadfrog #frogger #ocean #oceansoftware #retrogames #retrogaming #pixelgamesuk #zxspectrum #spectrumgames
